        Add a card to the hand.

      • removeCardBySplit

        public void removeCardBySplit()
        Remove the second card of the hand along with the value of that card and set the boolean "splitted" to true.

      • addCardValue

        public void addCardValue(Card card)
        Increase the total value of the hand with the value of a specified card.
        Parameters:
        card - the card which value is to be added to the hand´s value

      • turnCard

        public void turnCard(Card card)
        Turn a card upside down (used to turn the dealers second card, making it visible).
        Parameters:
        card - the card to turn upside down.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset the hand by removing all cards and set all values to default.

      • makeHandGlow

        public void makeHandGlow(java.lang.Boolean turn)
        Make the cards of the hand glow or make them blurry.
        Parameters:
        turn - whether or not to make the card glow (false makes them blurry).
